module_restrictions: Exchange students may select any of the courses offered within the college that they are admitted into, granted there is availability and that they meet the prerequisites.
visa_info: Exchange or guest students will typically receive a J-1 visa status for the duration of study.
accommodations_info: On-campus housing is NOT guaranteed for exchange students. For those living off-campus, students exchanging for one semester should sublet or find a roommate who may be searching for someone to fill a vacancy as most apartment leases are for a full-year. Refer to https://internationalexchanges.pitt.edu/housing for more information on housing options.
cost_of_living: Refer to http://internationalexchanges.pitt.edu/costs for estimated monthly expenses.
university_description: The University of Pittsburgh is a public research university in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. It offers over 400 degree programs in areas such as law, medicine, engineering, education, and the arts and sciences.
location_cost_of_living: The cost of living in Pittsburgh is lower than the US national average. Housing and transportation are particularly affordable, making the city a great option for students.
location_weather: Pittsburgh has a temperate climate with four distinct seasons. Summers are warm and humid, while winters are cold and snowy. Spring and fall are mild.
location_description: Pittsburgh is a dynamic city with a rich cultural history. It is home to many museums, galleries, and theaters. It also has a thriving food scene and many outdoor recreational opportunities.
location_crime: Pittsburgh has a higher-than-average crime rate, particularly in the downtown area. However, the University of Pittsburgh's campus is generally considered safe.
location_transportation: Pittsburgh has a public transportation system consisting of buses and light rail trains. The university also offers a shuttle service for students. Biking and walking are also popular modes of transportation.
location_halal: Halal food options are available in Pittsburgh, particularly in the Squirrel Hill neighborhood.
location_vegetarian: Vegetarian food options are widely available in Pittsburgh, with many restaurants offering vegetarian and vegan menus.
